title: Still miss this game.  Any west coast server for ranked yet?
body:
I got to admit I still miss this game sometimes since quitting after the server move screwed west coast.

Have they fixed things so you can play ranked with west coast yet?

replies.body: There is really no problem. What? you get 10 more ping than what you used to have. That is not much, just get used to it

> [{quoted}](name=Sallu786,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Bq5ls2EU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-24T00:56:42.643+0000)
>
> There is really no problem. What? you get 10 more ping than what you used to have. That is not much, just get used to it

Nope, 50 more, from 60 to 110.  Which pros have likened to playing drunk

> [{quoted}](name=Agraajag,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Bq5ls2EU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-24T01:10:32.607+0000)
>
> Nope, 50 more, from 60 to 110.  Which pros have likened to playing drunk

Source?

I mean, personally I played on 70-100 ping with no issue. When the move happened, since I live in Chicago, the ping is amazing now. It takes time to get used to. Believe me, the people on the East coast will not back you up in the slightest. If you are complaining about 70-100 ping, play on 150-170 ping.

The other issue could be your ISP. As Riot said when the move happened, depending on how your ISP routes information, distance may not have the biggest impact. Example of this would be people who live in Chicago getting worse ping after the move.
^ I play on 100 easily with no problems it just takes time getting used to, back in the day i used to play around 220 and still did decent

At least you don't have to suffer like the east coasters did, with pings of 100 - 500ms which made the game unplayable for many of them! I played just fine with a 60 - 80ms ping, and so can you! Suck it up and deal!

> [{quoted}](name=TheWaggyLab,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Bq5ls2EU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-24T06:15:10.207+0000)
>
> At least you don't have to suffer like the east coasters did, with pings of 100 - 500ms which made the game unplayable for many of them! I played just fine with a 60 - 80ms ping, and so can you! Suck it up and deal!

It was 60 for me pre-server move.  Now it's 110, which is not manageable.  That's why I ask
